mapper.insert: insert into t_coupon (id, coupon_cart, scenic_id, reduce_money, total_price, valid_time, coupon_status, loginacct) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{couponCart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scenicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reduceMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{validTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginacct,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_coupon set coupon_cart = #{couponCart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scenic_id = #{scenicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reduce_money = #{reduceMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, total_price = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, valid_time = #{validTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coupon_status = #{couponStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, loginacct = #{loginacct,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, coupon_cart, scenic_id, reduce_money, total_price, valid_time, coupon_status, loginacct from t_coupon where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, coupon_cart, scenic_id, reduce_money, total_price, valid_time, coupon_status, loginacct from t_coupon
